flail.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: to wave your arms or legs in an uncontrolled way
flail.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: He flailed wildly as she tried to hold him down.

flail.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: to beat someone or something violently, usually with a stick
flail.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: to beat grain with a flail
flail.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: a tool consisting of a stick that swings from a long handle, used in the past to separate grain from wheat by beating it
